metadata.name: Pixeltown #1
metadata.description: this is not a pfp project. this is an NFT skirmish. wager your land. wager your nfts. wager your soul. winner takes all. each tile is a deed of land ownership which allows you to battle against your neighbours. all outcomes are completely random. the winner is determined after 3 battles, each of which comprises of a best-of-five skirmish, with an increasing number of units after every round. good luck. come get some!
